images.caption: Figure 1:Main experimental results.(a)Table of mean rewards (standard error) for all methods across three data quality tiers.(b)Bar chart visualizing the mean rewards, clearly showing MADPO’s superior performance and robustness compared to baselines. Forβ\beta-DPO and MADPO, we report the performance of the best hyperparameter configuration found for each individual tier.

Figure 2:Sensitivity analysis for MADPO’s key hyperparameters across the three data quality tiers.(Left)Performance as a function of the margin threshold,τ\tau. Higher values are generally better, though performance plateaus on High Quality data.(Right)Performance as a function of the amplification intensity,cc, where we setcmax=cc_{\max}=candcmin=1/cc_{\min}=1/c. Performance consistently improves with higher intensity across all tiers.
